## Download UCDP Data

```{r, eval=TRUE}
# Location: https://ucdp.uu.se/downloads/

download.file(
  "https://ucdp.uu.se/downloads/ged/ged221-csv.zip",
  destfile = "Lec_09/data/ged221-csv.zip")

# Decompress the downloaded ZIP file
unzip("Lec_09/data/ged221-csv.zip", exdir = "Lec_09/data")

```
